img_above_text:
![Foothills Walkthrough \(67\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/12/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2867%29.png)
You can then detransform and follow up with your own strong attacks and it will continue to burn for a while until it douses itself off with the water.
img_below_text:
As its health starts to get low, it will dive into the water and behave similarly to Jiao-Loong of Waves, where it will try to dive up and catch you by surprise. You'll see it emerge and peek up before it disappears again and the ground begins to rumble. You'll be able to see ripples in the water, that show you the exact path the beast is taking to reach you.
Water-Wood Beast

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing a battle against the Water-Wood Beast. The creature, partially submerged in water, appears engulfed in flames and covered in foliage, indicating it has been set on fire during combat. The surrounding environment features a forested area with a calm water surface. This visual aligns with the preceding text, which describes the strategy of burning the beast and following up with strong attacks, and the following text, which warns of its behavior as its health diminishes, including diving into the water to surprise the player.
